title: Postdoctoral Association Activity Fund
description: To provide support for the programs and  activities of the Postdoctoral Association at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus including official functions, presenters' or speakers' fees, travel, event costs, and daily business operations.
marketingContent: To provide support for the programs and  activities of the Postdoctoral Association at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus including official functions, presenters' or speakers' fees, travel, event costs, and daily business operations.
